title: Software Engineer, Streaming
description: Build and optimize the core streaming platform that delivers content to millions of users.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
5+ years of experience in distributed systems or high-performance computing
Proficiency in Java, Scala, or Go
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable streaming services
Optimize video delivery and playback performance
Participate in on-call rotations and incident response

title: Product Manager, Content Personalization
description: Drive the product strategy for Netflix's content personalization and recommendation systems.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
6+ years of experience in product management
Experience with recommendation systems or machine learning products
responsibilities: Define product vision and roadmap for personalization
Collaborate with data science and engineering teams
Analyze user behavior and drive A/B testing

title: Data Scientist, Growth
description: Leverage data to identify growth opportunities and optimize user acquisition and retention.
requirements: Master's or PhD in a quantitative field
4+ years of experience in data science or analytics
Proficiency in SQL and Python or R
responsibilities: Design and analyze experiments for growth initiatives
Build predictive models for user behavior
Communicate insights to marketing and product teams

title: Senior Security Engineer
description: Design and implement security solutions to protect Netflix's infrastructure and data.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
7+ years of experience in security engineering
Expertise in cloud security (AWS, Azure, GCP)
responsibilities: Develop and implement security best practices
Conduct security assessments and penetration testing
Respond to security incidents and vulnerabilities

title: Software Engineer, UI Platform
description: Build and maintain the core UI platform and tools used by product teams to create Netflix experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
4+ years of experience in frontend development
Proficiency in React, JavaScript, and TypeScript
responsibilities: Develop reusable UI components and libraries
Provide technical guidance to product teams
